name: silence-router
description: Silence-router is just a router for Rest Service

scripts.coverageUnit: mkdir perso -p && jscoverage lib lib-cov && env COVERAGE=1  mocha test/unit/ --recursive --reporter html-cov > perso/coverage-unit.html
scripts.coverageInteg: mkdir perso -p && jscoverage lib lib-cov && env COVERAGE=1  mocha test/integration/ --recursive --reporter html-cov > perso/coverage-integ.html
scripts.coveragee2e: mkdir perso -p && jscoverage lib lib-cov && env COVERAGE=1  mocha test/e2e/ --recursive --reporter html-cov > perso/coverage-e2e.html
